I got the latest version of the code (http://nerddinner.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/view/8ea1ecf71b30) and opened the solution in the MVC 4 folder.

 

the MVC 4 project is a little rough on the edges, there is code that is copy pasted from other versions and it has some files that you'll find missing (like the .format function in the javascript)

 

But it does stuff when you debug it and you can see how some of the bits work together; but if you are planning on extending it, well then it might not be the best starting point as there are some dangling references you'll run into.
